sentences.english: Chum Kiu is a middle rank routine of Wing Chun.
sentences.chinese: 尋橋是詠春拳的中級套路。

sentences.english: In Wing Chun there is a set form for mook jong training.
sentences.chinese: 在詠春拳裏有一套完整的木人樁訓練體系。

sentences.english: I am at present mainly teaching Wing Chun to students in several schools and organizations in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 現時我主要在香港的幾間學校及機構教授詠春拳。

sentences.english: Bruce was trained in the classical Wing Chun style.
sentences.chinese: 布魯斯是受過訓練的在古典詠春拳的作風。

definition: Wing Chun/same as 詠春拳|咏春拳[yong3 chun1 quan2]/Yongchun - "Singing Spring Fist" (Chinese martial art)
Cai Li Fo, Choy Li Fut, Choy Lay Fut, Choi Lei Fut, Choy Lai Fut, Choy Ley Fut, Choi Lei Faht, Tsai Li Fo, Choi Leih Faht - Martial Art
Ba Fa Quan "Eight Methods" - Martial Art
Zhao'an county in Zhangzhou 漳州[Zhang1 zhou1], Fujian
Yan Fu (1853-1921), influential Chinese writer and translator of Western books, esp. on social sciences
Jiaoling county in Meizhou 梅州, Guangdong
Fenglin town in Hualien County 花蓮縣|花莲县[Hua1 lian2 Xian4], east Taiwan
Ninghua county in Sanming 三明[San1 ming2], Fujian
Huangshan prefecture-level city centered around Huangshan Mountains in south Anhui
Longkou county level city in Yantai 煙台|烟台, Shandong
